attributes.additional_details:
To ensure the health and safety of staff in schools is maintained so that schools can reopen safely as quickly as possible.
To review the priority order for people to receive the vaccine and make school staff a high priority.
attributes.background: Staff working in schools are key workers and must be protected as much as possible during the COVID pandemic. They should therefore be given urgent vaccination, along with hospital and care staff, so that children can return to their educational settings as quickly as possible.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
